sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { MapPin, CloudSun, Droplets, Compass, ThermometerSun, Loader2, } from "lucide-react"; export function WeatherLocation({ weather, location, isLoading }) { // simple helpers const coordsText = location && typeof location.latitude === "number" ? `${location.latitude.toFixed(4)}°N, ${location.longitude.toFixed(4)}°E` : "Detecting…"; const climateLabel = location?.climate || "Unknown"; // ---------- LOADING STATE ---------- if (isLoading && !weather && !location) { return (

Detecting Location & Weather…

Using your browser’s location to estimate climate conditions.

); } // ---------- MAIN CARD ---------- return (
{/* LEFT: LOCATION */}

Your Location

{location ? `${location.city || "Your Location"}, ${ location.country || "Unknown" }` : "Location unavailable"}

Climate Zone {climateLabel}
Coordinates {coordsText}
{/* RIGHT: WEATHER */}

Current Weather

{weather?.condition || "Default conditions"}

{/* Temperature */}
Temperature

{weather ? `${weather.temperature}°C` : "--"}

{weather?.season || "Seasonal pattern"}

{/* Humidity */}
Humidity

{weather ? `${weather.humidity}%` : "--"}

Rainfall: {weather ? `${weather.rainfall} mm` : "--"}

{/* Season / extra line */} {weather && (
Current{" "} {weather.season.toLowerCase()}{" "} conditions in your area are considered when generating crop recommendations.
)}
); }
